backend.XMLConverter module¶

exception backend.XMLConverter.JSONDecodeError(msg: str='')[source]¶

Bases: Exception

Base exception class, raised when an error occurs while processing JSON

Parameters:msg – message describing the error
class backend.XMLConverter.JtXConverter[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class responsible for converting dictionary representation of a JSON structure to a string representation of an XML structure.

static comparison_json_to_xml(json_dict: dict) -> (<class 'str'>, <class 'str'>, <class 'str'>, <class 'str'>)[source]¶

Takes dictionary representation of an JSON file describing comparison and returns XML representations of structures to be compared and their simple types. Types are: ‘rg’ | ‘fa’ | ‘re’ | ‘cfg’ | ‘pda’.

Parameters:json_dict – dictionary representation of an JSON file
Returns:tuple of string representations of (XML file, its object type, XML file, its object type)
Raises:KeyError – when JSON dict has wrong structure
static cyk_json_to_xml(json_dict: dict) -> (<class 'str'>, <class 'str'>)[source]¶

Takes dictionary representation of an JSON file describing CYK input and returns generated string and the grammar to be checked as XML string

Parameters:json_dict – dictionary representation of an JSON file
Returns:tuple of generated string and string XML representation of the grammar
Raises:KeyError – when JSON dict has wrong structure
static derivation_json_to_xml(json_dict: dict) -> (<class 'str'>, <class 'str'>)[source]¶

Takes dictionary representation of an JSON file describing derivation and returns drivation string and derived regexp as XML string

Parameters:json_dict – dictionary representation of an JSON file
Returns:tuple of derivation string and string XML representation of the derived regular expression
Raises:KeyError – when JSON dict has wrong structure
static simple_json_to_xml(json_dict: dict) → str[source]¶

Base mathod of the class, takes dictionary representation of an JSON file, and converts it to an XML string

Parameters:

json_dict – dictionary representation of an JSON file
Returns:

string representation of an XML file that was converted from given JSON
Raises:
  • KeyError – when JSON dict has wrong structure - the ‘type’ property is not present
  • TypeError – when there is unknown object type
static transformation_json_to_xml(json_dict: dict) -> (<class 'str'>, <class 'str'>, <class 'str'>)[source]¶

Takes dictionary representation of an JSON file describing transformation and returns transformation source in XML string, its type and transformation target type. Types are: ‘rg’ | ‘fa’ | ‘re’ | ‘cfg’ | ‘pda’.

Parameters:json_dict – dictionary representation of an JSON file
Returns:tuple of string representations of (XML file - transformation source, source type, target type)
Raises:KeyError – when JSON dict has wrong structure

class backend.XMLConverter.XtJConverter[source]¶

Bases: object

Base class responsible for converting string representation of an XML structure to a string representation of an JSON structure.

static cnf_leftrec_xml_to_json(result: str, steps: list) → dict[source]¶

Converts given result of a conversion to CNF or left recursion removal and its steps to a dictionary, that can be converted to JSON

Parameters:
  • result – resulting grammar of the algorithm
  • steps – list of grammars that represents the steps of the algorithm
Returns:

dictionary representation of the result and the steps, can be converted to JSON
static comparison_xml_to_json(result: bool) → dict[source]¶

Converts given result of a comparison to a dictionary, that can be converted to JSON

Parameters:result – result of a comparison, bool value
Returns:dictionary with the result, that can be converted to JSON
static cyk_xml_to_json(result: bool, steps: str) → dict[source]¶
static derivation_xml_to_json(result: str, steps: list) → dict[source]¶

Converts given result of a derivation and its steps to a dictionary, that can be converted to JSON

Parameters:
  • result – resulting RegExp of a derivation
  • steps – list of RegExps that represents the steps of the derivation
Returns:

dictionary representation of the result and the steps, can be converted to JSON
static minimization_xml_to_json(result: str, steps: list) → dict[source]¶
static simple_xml_to_json(xml_file: str) → dict[source]¶

Converts given XML file to a dictionary, that can be turned into JSON file. Converts XML file to ElementTree structure, according to the parent tag of the structure chooses correct conversion method.

Parameters:xml_file – string representation of an xml file
Returns:dictionary that represents converted object
Raises:TypeError – when there is unknown object type
backend.XMLConverter.json_to_xml(json_file: str, param: str=None)[source]¶

Converts given JSON string representation to corresponding XML string representation

Parameters:
  • json_file – string with JSON file to convert
  • param – optional parameter describing JSON file structure - if it’s simple, or one of the special cases - comparison, transformation or derivation. If it’s not a special case, it can be omitted.
Returns:

representation of a converted JSON file, usually XML string or tuple of XML strings and needed parameters
Raises:

JSONDecodeError – in case of wrong structure of the JSON file
backend.XMLConverter.xml_to_json(result, param: str=None, steps=None) → str[source]¶

Converts given algorithm result to corresponding JSON string representation

Parameters:
  • result – algorithm result, can be string representing XML file or a bool value, according to param attribute
  • param – optional parameter describing result structure. If it’s one of the special cases - derivation, comparison, minimization, cnf conversion, left recursion removal or cyk algorithm - it must be present. If it’s not a special case, it can be omitted.
  • steps – optional parameter describing steps of the algorithm. Either a string or a list of strings, according to the param specified. May be present with derivation, minimization or cyk. Must be present with cnf conversion and left recursion removal.
Returns:

string representation of a JSON file
Raises:

XMLDEcodeError – in case of wrong structure of the XML file
